QuestData.Title: Vordrassil's Sapling
QuestData.Description: The druids of old seem to have had good reasons for destroying Vordrassil. We cannot let the furbolgs regrow it.$B$BOn the other hand, saving Ursoc's spirit hinges on the magic contained by the sapling.$B$BTake this torch and use it to burn the tree. You will find it in the middle of Grizzlemaw, inside Vordrassil's old trunk.$B$BBring me Vordrassil's ashes. It is my hope that once purified by fire, we may use its magic to cleanse Ursoc's spirit of its dark taint.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hierophant Thayreen in Amberpine Lodge wants you to take the Verdant Torch and use it to burn Vordrassil's Sapling. Bring Vordrassil's Ashes back to Hierophant Thayreen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you brought me the ashes, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes! Vordrassil's magic is still present in these ashes. There might be hope for Ursoc yet.
